message.raw: Changed heightfield data to decouple the precision of the height data from the ODE build setting. Added two replacement data configuration functions dGeomHeightfieldDataBuildSingle and dGeomHeightfieldDataBuildDouble to specify which type you want. Also, fixed a compile error in test_heightfield when building in double precision mode.
message.html: Changed heightfield data to decouple the precision of the height data from the ODE build setting.
